title: Google assistant isn't working no matter what i do please help I've done everything literally
content: I'm on a NOKIA 6.1. just got a new security patch update and after that google Assistant won't work in any way possible you can think off I've uninstalled and joined the beta program after that reinstalled US English language and set it as default from the start, doesn't let me do any thing doesn't recognize my voice even if it has my voice models for over 4 years now but now I can't even delete the model,I've tried clearing up the apps cache even though nothing helped
